title: Putin Has Broken Russia’s Brightest Tech Business–Founder Arkady Volozh Loses $2 Billion In Three Months - Forbes
content: Putin Has Broken Russia’s Brightest Tech Business–Founder Arkady Volozh Loses $2 Billion In Three Months  Forbes
description: The founder of Yandex, Russia’s alternative to Google, falls out of the billionaire ranks amid his country’s chaos.
